Masq

Masq-app

This page is a demo of masq-app, here we create profiles and authorize application to connect. This is only a demo for one application which stores a list of POI (Point of Interest).Open Masq-app and the web app in two tabs, or better in two browsers.

Create a profile

The first step is to create a profile.

Create profile

Replicate masq-profiles

Now Masq will create a masq-profiles db and synchronize it with the web app

Synchronize profiles

Replicate app data

Now Masq will create a db dedicated to the web app data and synchronize it.

Synchronize data

A connection trouble ?

If you close the tab or the connection is lost, click here.

Open and sync.
